New Records: Shaheen Shah Afridi took 3 early wickets and finished the match with two sixes.
Babar Azam scored an unbeaten 32 and shepherded Pakistan's chase.
Ireland's Gareth Delany and Mark Adair formed a 44-run partnership off 30 balls.
Josh Little's calf injury forced Ireland to bowl spin, leading to Shaheen's decisive contribution.
Key Match Events: Shaheen Shah Afridi's early wickets set up Pakistan's chase.

Josh Little's injury led to Pakistan's strategic adjustment with spin bowling.
Post-Match Reflections: Babar Azam expressed relief at the win despite the nervy finish.
Shaheen Shah Afridi reflected on his impactful performance with the new ball.
Imad Wasim's final game for Pakistan ended on a high note with key contributions.
